00023 #ifndef CAMERA_H_
00024 #define CAMERA_H_
00025 
00026 #include <iostream>
00027 #include <SFML/Graphics.hpp>
00028 #include "Anim_Sprite.h"
00029 #include "Phys_Object.h"
00030 
00031 class Camera {
00032 protected:
00033         float x,y;
00034         int size_x,size_y;
00035         float min_x,min_y,max_x,max_y;//cam limits
00036         int inertia;
00037         float invert_speed;
00038 public:
00039         Camera(float _x, float _y,int _size_x,int _size_y,float _min_x,float _min_y,float _max_x,float _max_y);
00040         virtual ~Camera();
00041         void set_position(float interest_x,float interest_y);
00042         float get_x(){return x;};
00043         float get_y(){return y;};
00044         int half_res_x(){return size_x/2;}
00045         int half_res_y(){return size_y/2;}
00046         bool draw_spr(sf::RenderWindow & App,Anim_Sprite spr);//add the camera shift
00047         bool draw_spr(sf::RenderWindow & App,Phys_Object spr,bool draw_shape=false);//draw shape, and add the camera shift
00048 };
00049 
00050 #endif /* CAMERA_H_ */
